ai-tha-ap170:2.4_0: I’m not quenched in the air.
ai-tha-ap170:3.3_0: my heart gave confidence in him,
ai-tha-ap170:3.4_0: the Buddha is unrivaled, but not a person.
ai-tha-ap170:4.2_0: but the cloth was hard to find.
ai-tha-ap170:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap170:4.4_0: but the fruit of good and bad deeds.
ai-tha-ap170:5.2_0: and then I was a wheel-turning monarch.
ai-tha-ap170:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap170:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Rohitassa.
ai-tha-ap170:8.1_0: and the eighth of the senior ones.
